name: Rocket's Raikou ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Lightning Burst
abilities.text: Whenever you attach a Darkness Energy card from your hand to Rocket's Raikou ex, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon and switch it with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Benched Pokémon to switch. This power can't be used if Rocket's Raikou ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Thunderous Blow
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Lightning Energy attached to Rocket's Raikou ex.
